contactDetails.description: The list of the individual's contact telephone numbers.

code.description: The numeric code for the associated 'type' property below where 9 = MOBILE TELEPHONE and 8 = EVENING TELEPHONE and 7 = DAYTIME TELEPHONE.

type.description:
The particular contact type. Currently supported values:

```
code type
 7   DAYTIME TELEPHONE
 8   EVENING TELEPHONE
 9   MOBILE TELEPHONE
10   FAX
11   PRIMARY E-MAIL
12   SECONDARY E-MAIL
```
If the backend returns an unexpected string it will be returned 'as is', i.e. untransformed, to a maximum of 35 characters.

residences.description: The list of the individual's residences.

type.description: Indicates the residence type BASE or NOMINATED

noLongerUsed.description: Indicates if the NOMINATED residence is no longer used (NLU). If the value is Y, the address is NLU. If the vale is N, the address is still in use.
